descriptions: Black velvet mask(s) stitched with silver thread
Small mirror(s) set in a painted wooden frame
Gold locket(s) with a painted portrait inside
Silver necklace(s) with a gemstone pendant
Gold bird cage(s) with electrum filigree
Silver-plated steel longsword(s) with jets set in hilt
Carved harp(s) of exotic wood with ivory inlay and zircon gems
Gold dragon comb(s) set with red garnets as eyes
Bottle stopper cork(s) embossed with gold leaf and set with amethysts
Ceremonial electrum dagger(s) with a black pearl in the pommel
Obsidian statuette(s) with gold fittings and inlay
Fine gold chain(s) set with a fire opal
Embroidered silk and velvet mantle(s) set with numerous moonstones
Platinum bracelet(s) set with a sapphire
Embroidered glove(s) set with jewel chips
Gold circlet(s) set with four aquamarines
Eye patch(es) with a mock eye set in blue sapphire and moonstone
Necklace string(s) of small pink pearls
Small gold statuette(s) set with rubies
Gold jewelry box(es) with platinum filigree
Jade game board(s) with solid gold playing pieces
Bejeweled ivory drinking horn(s) with gold filigree
